content.rendered:
Oasis Home Smart

Unlock your financial potential!

An educational platform for entrepreneurs and investors of any skill level that provides knowledge and tools to take your income to the next level.
The main objective of the platform is to provide access to quality business education and help to take the first step in real business. The platform provides several training courses that are suitable both for those who just want to start and for professionals.

How does it work?

“How to make money with
foreign real estate.”

Constantly updated database of real estate investment projects

Opportunity to invest yourself and earn a decent income on recommendations

What are the advantages?

Knowledge in practice, not dry theory

Teaching Effective Thinking in the Digital Age

Capital formation techniques to achieve financial freedom and more

+
1
2
3
+
+

Create a command  

and scaling!

2500+

partners around the world

Learned - Implemented - Got results!

Choose your package directly  

now and scale up!

Partner Oasis Home

All the privileges of START Oasis Home package #1, as well as:

  • Extended access to Oasis Home.SMART Object Database (More than 200 objects)

  • Business training in real estate sales from the founder of the holding Arman Tukeshov

  • Course “Creating a Business from scratch” in international real estate

  • Master class “How to sell real estate online?”

  • Access to online tools for Oasis Home business development

  • Access to materials on Oasis Home Life Accumulation Insurance

  • Income from the promotion of Oasis Home Life Accumulation Insurance line of business

  • Opportunity for joint real estate purchases with Oasis Home holding partners

  • Valuable gifts for career growth: Diamond Watches, Cars and Villas

  • Access to online business application AW Radio for 3 years from the best salesman in the world Andreas Wiens (Germany).

Show more

USD/EUR 600

To the project.

Bussines Oasis Home

All privileges of Business Package #1 “START Oasis Home”, #2 “PARTNER Oasis Home”, as well as:

  • MBA School of Real Estate Sales SUPERAGENT Oasis Home:

-Algorithm for creating “LIVE” scripts to build trust with buyers
— How to identify the Emotional bias of buyers and not to be manipulated by them
— How to effectively communicate and convey information to Visuals, Audials, Kinisthetes and Discretes
— “Customer Segmentation”, how not to offer everything and how to identify true customer needs?
— “Maturing” customers, how to follow up with customers and sell with 100% conversion rate?
— How to always close deals on a recommendation even if they tell you no?

Recordings of Oasis Home real estate sales training marathons

One-click access to all the resources of the holding “GOOGLE-POOL Oasis Home”:
— All of the holding company’s websites and real estate properties
— Training programs for beginners and experienced agents
— Calculators, presentations and other tools for effective action on results

Training courses from Adleracademy and Andreas Wiens:

A super three-hour webinar from the Virtuoso Selling course
Topic: “Selling the Idea” by Andreas Wiens

Twelve hours of audio training from Andreas Vince: Telemarketing and Recommendations, Business from the Home Office, Keeping Team Spirit and Online — Telemarketing and Recommendations.
and Online Recruiting.

Corporate coaching with Andreas Wiens on practicing business tools for participants of
Oasis Home Holding business forums

Access to AW Radio online business application for 3 years

Show more

USD/EUR 1.100

To the project.

Leader Oasis Home

All privileges of Business Package #1 “START Oasis Home”, #2 “PARTNER Oasis Home”, #3 “BUSSINES Oasis Home”, as well as:

  • Opportunity to conclude an agreement on long-term cooperation under Oasis Home Franchise
  • Adaptation of Oasis Home Holding franchise in your city

  • Additional financial motivation from the holding company when opening an Oasis Home office

  • Access to updated price lists from developers

  • Possibility of individual advertising campaign to attract clients

  • Offers to participate in Oasis Home investment projects

  • Opportunity to conclude contracts with developers from Oasis Home holding company

  • Training courses from Adleracademy and Andreas Wiens:

  • Ten three hour webinars “Virtuoso Selling” or How to sell without objections?
    (10 recorded webinars * 3 hours = 30 hours)

  • Ten live three hour webinars “The Velvet Sale” or, How to sell when there are objections?
    (10 live webinars * 3 hours = 30 hours)

  • “Crisis Program” by Andreas Wiens: Telemarketing and tips, business from home office,
    Team Building and Online Recruiting (12 hours of audio training).

  • 12 two-hour hands-on electives with Andreas Vince to practice the material covered.
    (12 live webinars * 2 hours = 24 hours)

  • Access to AW Radio online business application for 3 years

Show more

USD/EUR 3.100

To the project.

By purchasing a training package, you become our partner. Only to our partners we offer a unique opportunity to receive a share of the profits of the whole company. You will receive a ready-made system for launching and developing your business by building a network of partners. This is one of the most effective ways to promote a project in terms of financial and time indicators.

All of these are already available on the website!

Become a partner
